pageContext.claim: “I have to tell you, I have to be always very truthful because if I'm a little bit off, they call me a liar. They'll say he gets a Pinocchio, the stupid Washington Post. They're Pinocchio.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has earned all of his Pinocchios fair and square. We tend not to bother with claims that are “a little bit off” when there are so many fantastically false claims emanating from the president.
